title: [Large-scale] Understanding the role of instructional design and technology (IDT) professionals: Employment trends and job analysis

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental understanding of higher education or corporate training sectors, experience in mathematics curriculum design
context.additional_context: Learners, as university educators or corporate trainers, analyze the role and hiring trends of IDT professionals and learn to apply these insights to actual instructional design

learning_goals: Learners will classify and explain the nine core job roles and five career requirements of IDT professionals.
Learners will comparatively analyze the 13 academic backgrounds and technical competencies required in educational institutions and corporate environments.
Learners will establish realistic career plans based on salary ranges (hourly to six-figure) and hiring conditions by career level (1â€“10 years).
